page.title: 08HEVERSHAM SPORTS DAY
page.content:
On Saturday, 22nd June, l985, it was Heversham Sports Day.
At l.30 p.m. it started with a Fancy Dress Parade. There were costumes from cows to clowns. There were boys band under 6, girls band under 6, boys 6 - l0, girls 6 - l0, boys and girls ll and over and doubles all ages.
Then it was the flat races for each age group. There were the sack races. Then there was the potato race. There was a slow bicycle race for boys and girls ll - l5 and boys and girls 8 - l0.
We had a short interval when we had tea. The children got a bottle of pop, crisps and ice cream each free.
